name: trebu
headline: Extract and organize order requests, supplier availabilities, andâ¦
description:
Trebu helps logistics companies to reliably detect and structure incoming sales orders by scanning and interpreting the thousands of incoming Whatsapp messages and emails they receive every day.
For example, we help a logistics broker to double the amount of daily reported shipment requests by automatically detecting messages asking for a shipping service and transferring the details into a structured database.

# Aumenta tus ventas a través de la detección automática 
# de
|
Detectamos posibles asignaciones al automatizar la captura de los programas de embarque y la oferta de disponibilidades de unidades desde Whatsapp y email
[Agenda tu demo](https://www.trebu.io/<https:/calendly.com/akle-trebu/30min>)[Ver más](https://www.trebu.io/<#Feature>)
Con la confianza de empresas líderes en logística
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c672d63b4e7aabccee66f0/66ce7393b541dee4ae1e3f78_1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c672d63b4e7aabccee66f0/66ce73a4124bf4ee8524a586_2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c672d63b4e7aabccee66f0/66ce73a4444377649c9f2b54_3.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c672d63b4e7aabccee66f0/66ce73a4b30a1d32ea2532be_5.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c672d63b4e7aabccee66f0/66ceabf581cb809aa155b108_Untitled%20design%20\(6\).png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c672d63b4e7aabccee66f0/66ce73a4807769a8b4866d2b_4.png)
{LA REALIDAD}
## Beneficios
### Incrementa tus ventas al realizar más asignaciones
Captura programas de carga de tus clientes, las disponibilidades de tus transportistas, y con eso encuentra asignaciones de manera más clara
### Aumenta la visibilidad de tu operación
Obtén información clara de los correos y mensajes de Whatsapp que te envían clientes y proveedores
### Reduce errores de captura
Elimina el error humano al capturar las órdenes de tus clientes
## Preguntas frecuentes
Contáctanos
¿Cómo funciona Trebu?
Trebu utiliza inteligencia artificial para transformar mensajes de WhatsApp y correos en datos clave. Captura, organiza y proporciona información operativa relevante.
¿En qué se diferencia Trebu de otras soluciones?
Trebu trabaja sobre tus procesos actuales. Se integra directamente a tu correo y Whatsapp y usa tu TMS, hojas de cálculo o como realices el proceso actualmente. No es una plataforma adicional que tus clientes o proveedores tienen que usar.
¿Cuánto tiempo toma implementar Trebu en mi empresa?
La implementación de Trebu es rápida y sencilla, en días estarás viendo los beneficios en tu empresa.
¿Hay soporte técnico disponible para usuarios de Trebu?
Sí, ofrecemos soporte técnico dedicado para garantizar que los usuarios obtengan el máximo provecho de Trebu. Puedes comunicarte con nuestro equipo en cualquier momento.
¿Trebu es adecuado para empresas de todos los tamaños?
Sí, Trebu se adapta a las necesidades de empresas de todos los tamaños. Desde pequeñas empresas hasta corporativos, nuestra plataforma es escalable y personalizable.
## Aumenta tus asignaciones hoy mismo
Programa una demostración para que veas cómo trebu te puede ayudar
[Agenda tu demo](https://www.trebu.io/<https:/calendly.com/akle-trebu/30min>)

generated_description:
**Trebu: Organizing Logistics with AI**

Trebu, founded in 2022 and hailing from Mexico City, is a dynamic player in the B2B logistics space. As part of the Y Combinator Batch S22, it’s making waves by tackling a pivotal problem: the overwhelming number of sales orders that logistics companies face daily. With a small but mighty team of three, they’re leveraging AI to streamline the chaos.

The core mission at Trebu is simple yet impactful. They extract and organize order requests and supplier availabilities from the sea of WhatsApp messages and emails that inundate logistics brokers. Imagine that—every day, hundreds of shipping requests are mixed in with casual chats, and Trebu uses intelligent algorithms to sift through this noise, automatically identifying and structuring pertinent info. For example, one client experienced a doubling of their daily shipment requests simply due to Trebu's automated systems.

What sets Trebu apart? Its integration. Instead of trying to force clients and suppliers onto a new platform, Trebu fits seamlessly into existing workflows—working with your current email, WhatsApp, and Transportation Management Systems (TMS). This means that adopting Trebu is refreshingly straightforward; companies can begin reaping the benefits in days, not weeks or months.

Beyond just improving order accuracy, Trebu brings clarity and visibility to operations, reducing human errors and enhancing the overall efficiency of logistics processes. Whether you’re a small startup or a large corporation, Trebu is scalable and customizable to meet your needs. Plus, dedicated technical support is always a click away, ensuring users maximize their experience.

Curious about how it works? Trebu utilizes AI to transform unstructured messages into actionable data, so logistics professionals can focus on what truly matters—driving business forward.

In an industry where every second counts and miscommunication can lead to costly mistakes, Trebu is a breath of fresh air. If you’re looking to enhance your logistics game, scheduling a demo could be your first step towards a more organized operation.

For more information, visit their site at [trebu.io](https://www.trebu.io/).
